title: LF Plat hyper carry adc to duo with
body:
I am a ex diamond support main, i play soraka, sona, janna, http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=toxic+warwick reason im not diamond is because i havent played support all season xd but now i am spamming it so im winning everygame, i am just looking for someone who i capable of autoing even when people are attacking them, so no fear while i heal them to full health the whole game.
 plat + player or high win rate player and plays a hyper carry is what i am looking for.
if you think you match this then give me a add and we can give it ago :) 
 name: Toxic warwick

replies.body:
hit me up in game if you're keen to try some games: 

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Mojeeer
iv sent you a friend request :)

What the hell is with your summoners?

The ADC is meant to take heal and the support is meant to take flash exhaust or flash ignite.

Support doing the healing is stupid as fuck dude, you need to go and watch the pros and realise that the ADC is meant to heal the support and the support does the damage. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IbbtHsnncjQ

How are you not in bronze.

Unbelievable....

lol you are such a troll hahaha you are s2 and if you knew what the pros are doing in solo queue you wouldnt be saying that lol.
but i really enjoy your troll message haha <3

Honestly though, supports were meant to take heal ever since it was a thing.

Now you just have to learn to play without flash so you can take another summoner like exhaust to help your ADC out even further.

Then you and your duo will be constantly shitting on your lane every game to the point where all you ever hear the enemy team say is "report this fucking bot lane" like I did when I was duo with a proper support.

They play solo queue for fun....

or do you think they play LCS matches and fuck around in those instead?

Wait, are you playing for fun? cause if so, that is not the vibe you are giving off.
